# Final Project (Salary Data)
## NBA Performance Correlation Analysis 

### IMPORTING DATA
This data comes from ESPN (http://espn.go.com/nba/salaries/_/year/2015) and is imported as csv by import.io.
```{r}
first <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (1).csv")
second <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (2).csv")
third <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (3).csv")
fourth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (4).csv")
fifth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (5).csv")
sixth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (6).csv")
seventh <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (7).csv")
eighth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (8).csv")
nineth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (9).csv")
tenth <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (10).csv")
eleventh <- read.csv("C:/Users/Laura Kim/OneDrive/LAURA/University of California Berkeley/CLASSES/FALL 15/STAT 133/Final Project/magic (11).csv")

first <- first[,c(3,5,8,10)]
second <- second[,c(3,5,8,10)]
third <- third[,c(3,5,8,10)]
fourth <- fourth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
fifth <- fifth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
sixth <- sixth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
seventh <- seventh[,c(3,5,8,10)]
eighth <- eighth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
nineth <- nineth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
tenth <- tenth[,c(3,5,8,10)]
eleventh <- eleventh[,c(3,5,8,10)]

salary1415 <- rbind(first, second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, nineth, tenth, eleventh)
colnames(salary1415) <- c("Player", "Position", "Team", "Salary14-15")
salary1415 <- salary1415[order(salary1415$Team),]
salary1415 <- salary1415[-c(1:44),]

write.csv(salary1415, "salary1415.csv")
```
